content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for considering my property, Ryanah. I believe that my apartment is a great fit for your needs, and I am willing to negotiate on the rental price to ensure that we both benefit. Could you please provide me with your preferred rental price range?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: my preferred rental price range is between 650 and 750 Euros per month. Thank you.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Understood, Ryanah. I am willing to negotiate within your preferred rental price range. Could you please tell me what specific features of the apartment you are interested in? This will help me determine the appropriate rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am interested in the apartment being fully furnished, having a balcony, and being located in a good area.

Thank you.

I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month. Please send me the lease agreement.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for accepting my offer, Ryanah. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement that works for both of us. I will send you the lease agreement as soon as possible. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
